item.title: Levka add a quote by Catherynne M. Valente
item.description: "Never put your faith in a Prince. When you require a miracle, trust in a Witch." -- Catherynne M. Valente

item.title: Levka add a quote by Catherynne Valente
Levka add a quote by Catherynne M. Valente
item.description: "I will not let her speak because I love her, and when you love someone, you do not make them tell war stories. A war story is a black space. On the one side is before and on the other side is after, and what is inside belongs only to the dead." -- Catherynne M. Valente

item.title: Levka add a quote by Catherynne M. Valente
item.description: "Perhaps all a Tsaritsa is is a beautiful cold girl in the snow, looking down at someone wretched, and not yielding." -- Catherynne M. Valente

item.title: Levka add a quote by Catherynne M. Valente
item.description: "War is not for winning, Masha," sighed Koschei, reading the tracks of supply lines, of pincer strategies, over her shoulder. "It is for surviving." -- Catherynne M. Valente
